title: @AllexFerr
author: @AllexFerr
content: i am looking for trustworthy brokers or distributors of antiminers and whatsminer in USA.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: If you want to buy large quantities I can connect you to someone who has ready stock in the U.S, I have other resellers who can arrange DDP shipping from HK to the U.S, but most of those folks have 10 MOQ, do let me know the quantity you are looking for and I should be able to help.

comments.author: @AllexFerr
comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on May 08, 2022, 03:42:31 AMIf you want to buy large quantities I can connect you to someone who has ready stock in the U.S, I have other resellers who can arrange DDP shipping from HK to the U.S, but most of those folks have 10 MOQ, do let me know the quantity you are looking for and I should be able to help.thank you i need to have some idea of the price difference between USa and china .i am looking for around 500 machines

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: You can try to contact offordscott he mostly promotes ASIC machines in the USA.Or you can try to contact him through telegram https://t.me/offordscott or email here offordscott@gmail.com or check his official thread here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5138318.0

comments.body: I could get you 500 refurbed s17s.USA seller.
